name: Chimes Spa Retreat

reviews.title: OK but a very nice B&B rather than cracking spa / hotel
reviews.text: Its fine - especially considering what other options are currently available elsewhere for travellers looking for something really special. But, dont be fooled by the website / blurb - this is absolutely not a 4 or 5* hotel.

reviews.title: Quite Unique
reviews.text: Very nice rooms (B&B style again - even the "spa" suites) with undeniably fabulous views.
Spa comprises of one room. My wife & I had a great massage in that one room - but one room is all it is.
reviews.title: Oh Dear....

description: The southern coast of Western Australia is where the forest meets the sea. It is unique. It is green. It is nature at its best. Tall stands of karri and tingle interspersed with verdant rolling hills sweep down to the most dramatic and picturesque coastline - an idyll providing many natural attractions. It is perhaps the prettiest place in Western Australia.
